title: E-Learning System Design Using a Systematic Software Engineering Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of software development processes and foundational educational technology concepts
context.additional_context: Strengthening e-learning system development capabilities by applying inductive online learning methodologies for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can manage the e-learning system development lifecycle by applying the 2TUP (Two-Team Universal Process) framework.
Learners can visualize system architecture using UML diagrams (class, use case, activity, sequence).
Learners can design five or more e-learning system functionality examples based on inductive learning scenarios.
Learners can apply a standardized communication framework for collaboration between instructional designers and developers.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
